title: An Apple Watch for Your 5-Year-Old? More Parents Say Yes.
description: As Apple prepares to unveil new models next week, the smart watch has found an unexpected audience: children as young as 5.
dc:creator: Kalley Huang and Brian X. Chen
media:credit: Chona Kasinger for The New York Times
media:description: Florian Fangohr with his son, Felix, who said he actually wanted a smartphone. “But the watch is still really, really nice,” the 8-year-old said.
